system.description:
Undead beings have DISADV on attack rolls against a target you touch. These beings also canâ€™t possess, compel, or beguile it.

When cast on an already possessed target, the possessing entity makes a CON check vs. the last spellcasting check. On a failure, the entity is expelled.
